90  unsigned int get_n_parameters()const
91  {
92  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
93  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plLearnNdNormal::get_n_parameters'");
94 
95  return dimension_ + dimension_*(dimension_+1)/2;
96  }
